name: Fundamental Mechanics 44/52
description: ‘Fundamental Mechanics’ is a series in 52 chapters. The ultrashort animations were made in 2019 on a mediocre iPhone using the Instagram stories feature while researching 16th century visual culture. The emblema were constructed from prefab components such as emojis and stickers, some designed by myself for a now defunct Giphy account. https://alexandracrouwers.com https://instagram.com/alexa_crwrs @acrwrs
